mapper.insert: insert into ${tableName} (port_title, dataType, dataVersion, useides, experience, user_account, port_state, reply_number, look_number, create_time, delete_flag) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{datatype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataversion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useides,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{experience,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{userAccount}, '未结', 0, 0, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, 0)
